main event: A radar detection and visual observation of a UFO occurred at Lake City AFS in December 1957.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about the size of 3 B-47 aircraft,The object was detected at an altitude of 13,000 feet,The observation lasted for 41 minutes,The estimated speed of the object was 90 knots, and it was suggested that the object was moving in the direction of the prevailing winds.
